description: The password_layout parameter in SAP HANA specifies the character types that the password must contain and how many.

queries.name: q_password_policy_password_layout
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'password_layout'

actions.description: The parameter password_layout parameter has been changed from the default value. Please review the parameter and take the action to ensure adequate password complexity.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_HANA_ONE/102d9916bf77407ea3942fef93a47da8/61662e3032ad4f8dbdb5063a21a7d706.html#password_layout,SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
